file_content.text: Can you hear me? This channel is still open... did Cheketta send a Jedi?
Along with a Special Forces team. He claimed they weren't with the Republic.
That was a Jedi, yes.
I'm sure he did.
How does it make you feel, watching me kill someone like that?
[Flirt] Did I impress you?
I can't say I didn't enjoy the show, but your timing could be better.
One Jedi or a hundred. What difference does it make?
Hardly a challenge for me.
Don't let your ego cost me my planet.
I handled it. You promised I'd have an army behind me.
You do your part, I do mine.
And you will.
My people are performing a full scan of the factory now that the defenses are down. I'll patch you in to the report.
My lord, we're detecting unusual signals from inside the factory. What appears to be a... hyperspace beacon.
It shouldn't be possible... it must've taken them decades.
Don't underestimate their engineers or their resources. What can it do?
In theory, starships could follow the beacon and jump in-system almost directly overhead.
The Republic is flying reinforcements straight to the Balmorran Arms Factory and bypassing our defenses.
You know where to look. Scan for enemy transports approaching the factory.
Check for ships, now!
All this time the Republic and their engineers were boxed in, they were laying the groundwork for invasion.
The enemy's been preparing.
Being governor of Balmorra isn't so easy after all.
More than you can handle?
I wasn't looking for an easy job. Scan for enemy transports approaching the factory!
Picking up... there are dozens of ships out there. Silhouette is Republic Special Forces, Triumph-class.
This is how they did it during the war--multiple strike teams, strategic objectives, one Jedi per military squad. They took entire planets.
They know we see them. They're rushing to land now!
If they're heading to the factory, we can stop them from the ground.
Let's stop them from landing.
Agreed. Take out the landing platforms and guidance systems. I'll have attack squadrons blow those ships out of the sky.
The Empire still runs this world. How much damage can those squads do?
How big a threat are they?
Our forces are armed to fight a traditional insurgency, not elite strike teams. We'd need a thousand Sith, not six million grunts.
Don't expect me to wait around while the place is overrun. This assault is your problem.
I'm not staying here.
It's an opportunity if we do this right. Or are you afraid?
Take out the landing platforms and guidance systems around the factory--I'll have attack squadrons blow those ships out of the sky.
Fail me now, and we perish with Balmorra.
Darth Lachris, can you read me? I'm lowering the barricades to the Balmorran Arms Factory.
I hear you perfectly--we'll start scanning the interior now.
Hold on... someone cut through this interference!
Pardon my interruption. I'm Grand Marshal Cheketta, formerly of the Republic Army.
I am apprentice to Darth Baras and voice of the Empire here.
I act with Sith authority.
You're the new governor's dog.
The man who stayed behind when the Republic abandoned this world. I recognize your kind.
I know who you are.
And I recognize yours, Sith.
Cheketta. On behalf of the Sith Empire and the legitimate Balmorran government, I suggest you surrender.
Time to end this rebellion.
I appreciate your concern, but I'm going to say "no."
Grand Marshal Cheketta. I work for Balmorra's new governor.
I'm just a hired gun.
The Sith announced her new position as you started your attack. I liked the last governor better; he didn't spit when he talked.
You're about to be overrun with Imperial troops, but this doesn't have to be a bloodbath. Talk to me, Cheketta.
Let's stop the violence.
You won't like what I have to say.
So you're the proud leader of these gutless wonders?
Your troops are pathetic.
If they're so gutless, why haven't you beaten them after all these years?
I'm not a complete fool--once I realized you planned to lower our defenses, I sent a few friends.
Jedi Knight Ralon Nys, reporting.
Tempest Squad, reporting.
Fresh "volunteers," who've taken a leave of absence to join the Balmorran resistance. Taste of what's coming.
You expect me to believe these people are acting without Republic orders? They're violating the peace treaty by supporting the resistance.
You're getting Republic aid!
Ralon, are you here on Republic orders?
No, sir.
There you go.
I'm surprised a Jedi could arrive on Balmorra unnoticed.
How did they get here?
We've got a few tricks left.
You've sent these people to their deaths.
More fools to slaughter.
If that's true, I'll shed a tear.
Go! Go!
